Location: Various states in India (Tamil Nadu, Odisha, Maharashtra, Gujarat, West Bengal, Punjab)
Qualifications required: A Degree (Graduation) in any discipline from a University recognized by the Govt. Of India or any equivalent qualification recognized as such by the Central Government.
Skills required: Proficiency in the local language of the applied state (reading, writing, speaking).
Age limit: Min - 20, Max - 30 (Age relaxation applicable for reserved categories)
Salary or compensation details: Basic: 48480-2000/7-62480-2340/2-67160-2680/7-85920. DA, HRA, CCA etc., will be as per rules in force from time to time.
